781410.name: Jam Studio VR - The Learning Station Song Bundle
781410.description:
13 Learning Station Interactive Music Videos, providing a wide variety of learning experiences for young children such as ABC's, shapes, days of the week, months of the year, basic counting, animal sounds, and much more.
SONGS INCLUDED
12 Months of the Year
7 Days of the Week
ABC Song
ABCs Phonics Song
Animal Sounds
BINGO
Counting to 10
Five Little Ducks
Five Little Monkeys
Grey Little Squirrel
Opposites
Rock n' Roll Nursery Rhymes
Scarecrow
Also includes exciting real instrument icons.
781410.supported_languages:
英语*, 简体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
